name: PideCita.com
tag_list: online-booking, online-agenda, cloud-computing, doctors, dentist, online-scheduling, crm, beauty-salons, web-agenda
overview:
PideCita.com is an online scheduling platform that provides the following advantages:

  • Small Business: Online Agenda to manage the scheduled appointments. Manage business resources, time and costs. Receive online appointments from clients automatically. Promote the business in Internet. Free access plus added value services.
  • Users Find desired service around home or work. Book appointments easily 24/7. Find promotions and discounts.
  • Advertisers Promote products and/or services locally and per segment.

milestones.description: New alpha version of the online web agenda of PideCita powered by the booking engine Bookitit.
milestones.source_description: New interface and features in the web online agenda

milestones.description: New version of PideCita Online Agenda based on Bookitit booking engine: liquid design, drag&drop, Multiple agendas view, appointments overlap, etc.
milestones.source_description: New version of PideCita Online Agenda
